alert.note: Alert for Cabo Rojo; Hormigueros; Mayaguez (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued September 22 at 11:43AM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM AST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of Puerto Rico, including the following counties, Cabo Rojo, Hormigueros and Mayaguez. * WHEN...Until 800 PM AST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Numerous roads remain closed due to flooding. Low-water crossings are inundated with water and may not be passable. It will take several hours for all the water from these storms to work through local drainage systems in urban areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1041 AM AST, Emergency Management in Cabo Rojo report that roads PR-114 and PR-103 are flooded with almost 4 to 5 feet of water. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Hormigueros, Cabo Rojo and Monte Grande. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
